subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Out of body? Spirit walking.
author: mamarottweiler@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1191038385
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I have been able to astral project a couple of times, but only after  
listening to A.P. tapes for at least 6 months. It was awesome!!!! And that was  back 
in 1992. Sure wish I could do it again. Maybe I will someday.
   Suzy
 



HOSPICE- Adding life to days when we can't add days  to life.
